original_text: The men took Jesus to the house of the most important priest. All the leaders of the priests met together there with the important Jews and with the teachers of God's Law.
korean_text: 그들이 예수를 끌고 대제사장에게로 가니 대제사장들과 장로들과 서기관들이 다 모이더라

sentences.original_text: The men took Jesus to the house
All the leaders of the priests met together there
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 제사장 지도자들이 그곳에 함께 모였습니다

sentences.original_text: and with the teachers of God's Law
